snippet.title: SPEED | Blender.Today LIVE #155
snippet.description:
I feel the need for speed.

Support core Blender development - https://fund.blender.org

--

00:00 Intro

01:40 EEVEE FUTURE https://code.blender.org/2021/06/eevees-future/ 
05:20 CODE READABILITY https://cloud.blender.org/training/scripting-for-artists/readability/ 

07:30 CYCLES
Cycles: optimize 3D viewport rendering with camera passepartout https://developer.blender.org/rB25316ef9d735281a83b41f9e14fa3c712b1ada82 

10:05 GEOMETRY NODES
Add Delete Geometry Node https://developer.blender.org/rB464797078d44a55b45560f561b20a546ce46bcd7 
Add Shader Curve Nodes https://developer.blender.org/rB8cd506639a789694bb229698adad6de36bc1a26d 
Curve Length Node https://developer.blender.org/rBddd4b2b785589595927d04eda08c673403994bad  https://developer.blender.org/T88725 
Support interpolation between curve domains  https://developer.blender.org/D11376 https://developer.blender.org/rBc97b6215a37e5eca744d54d2e80741af78e1dafc 
Draw curve data in the viewport https://developer.blender.org/rBac833108dbbaa5f2a6d62effe962eb289cc92291 
Support curve data in the geometry delete node https://developer.blender.org/rBe5a1cadb2f7a0a4e4ff4580e3d0865342afd0da7 
Expose texture and material inputs to modifier https://developer.blender.org/rB3025c348253a66f9c316259aa03f8884bf56d779 
Polish switch node UI https://developer.blender.org/rB653bbaa246e3fa57b0b7846704fe5ce432659bb9 
Skip calculating normals in transform node https://developer.blender.org/rB17b09b509c069dad6817e4c123bca50bd0682578 
disable multi-threading in evaluator for now https://developer.blender.org/rB223c6e1ead2940a89465ff66765d16ac14a992b7 
Nodes: Add Multiply Add to Vector Math nodes https://developer.blender.org/rB00073651d420c852b271127fe453d2170471321a 

20:12 GREASE PENCIL
Add a use_light option when creating an object. https://developer.blender.org/rB45b28c0f88475f0b2d556a237d474c7415344461 
Bake GPencil object transforms into a new GPencil object https://developer.blender.org/rB06f86dd4d9a2a4250279f40acb6ca48191a094da 
Add option to disable masks in view layer https://developer.blender.org/rBe459a25e6cbe9321ad25f87843e2fe5a8a2306f9 
New operator to Normalize strokes https://developer.blender.org/rBf944121700daf267766399ef368834be3cdec518 
Line Art feature update: List Optimization https://developer.blender.org/D11302
 
25:00 LIBRARIES
LibOverride: add recursive resync. https://developer.blender.org/rB72d660443bdb8ed0b8ab34fdfe068d4e065d7c58
 
25:45 UI
Overlay: Flash on Mode Transfer overlay https://developer.blender.org/rBdba3fb9e091acfa7d2144468a220b2b0d577c15d 
Keymap: use D-Key for view-pie menu https://developer.blender.org/rBf92f5d1ac62c66ceb7a6ac1ff69084fbd5e3614a 
Object: support running transfer mode in any object mode https://developer.blender.org/rB69e15eb1e4a520764ca30c82dcadffe42c96707e 
VSE: Add refresh_all operator to all sequencer regions
Display source video fps in the VSE http://developer.blender.org/D11441 
Update Camera presets https://developer.blender.org/rBd486ee2dbdd34e00a4d575fab6feb3e36b486275

34:35 FIXES AND PERFORMANCE
Edit Mesh: partial updates for normal and face tessellation https://developer.blender.org/rBc2fa36999ff25ce2d011971a460d7efa11705e57 
Refactor: DRW Mesh Extractor: Join the extractors in a same loop https://developer.blender.org/rB44d2479dc36fe3409afc660eea369bea8a517987 
Undo: resolve inefficient edit-mesh memory use with multiple objects https://developer.blender.org/rBdeb71cef38b6482d513d2e85dc540b40419897e8 
Boolean: applying patch D11431 to speed up hole-tolerant raycast. https://developer.blender.org/rBa1556fa05ca96e43b70aa4f6b6284eb581701e4d 
Speedup exact boolean by avoiding some mallocs and frees. https://developer.blender.org/rB8180d478e1aefbbe538bd54b42dda388b482abf5  
Boolean exact: speedup when there are many components. https://developer.blender.org/rBdc960a81d1bdc8c91a6967f85d1943896b06dc47 
Boolean exact: speedup by parallelizing a plane calculation. https://developer.blender.org/rB81366b7d2c548f40843c7f87842710e3a2019136 
Exact Boolean: speed up when there are many separate components. https://developer.blender.org/rB8e43ef5f318690d4924bd0861f5fd37a85999083 

44:09 WINDOWS
Win: Add launcher to hide the console window flash https://developer.blender.org/rBf3944cf503966a93a124e389d9232d7f833c0077

45:38 POTPOURRI
Tests: add utility to generate interactive user actions https://developer.blender.org/rB3ec57ce6c7fcd3aa59c9b60139321c11f73fb7f7 

46:35 Q&A

--

snippet.title: EEVEE VOLUMES | Blender.Today LIVE #145
snippet.description:
BLENDER TODAY #145 - 29-03-2021
00:00 INTRO
01:25 ANNOUNCEMENTS
New Lessons On Animation https://cloud.blender.org/blog/master-rubber-hose-pose-new-animation-lessons 
BLENDER STUDIO HIRING https://www.blender.org/jobs/blender-3d-generalist/ 
Blender Network sunsetting https://www.blender.org/press/sunsetting-blender-network-in-2021/ 

06:30 EEVEE
EEVEE: Volumetrics: Add Area light shape support https://developer.blender.org/rB355f884b2f0932e0e1d50e9506d4c0e3bf6e2289 
https://wiki.blender.org/wiki/Reference/Release_Notes/2.93/EEVEE#Volumetrics 

11:52 GREASE PENCIL
GPencil: New modules for Import and Export 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BMm0KeMJsI4 
https://developer.blender.org/rBa8a92cd15a5251377474fbfdcf9ff0298a8457a9 

14:24 GEOMETRY NODES
Geometry Nodes: Add Attribute Map Range Node https://developer.blender.org/D10344
Geometry Nodes: Add Attribute Clamp Node https://developer.blender.org/D10526
Geometry Nodes: show domain in attribute fill node https://developer.blender.org/D10789
Geometry Nodes: Remove location and rotation from mesh primitives https://developer.blender.org/rB23d2174d6bc40f4426ece2cb5627fc78ea9cf2fa
Nodes: Add Refract and Faceforward functions to Vector Maths nodes https://developer.blender.org/D10622
Geometry Nodes: Add remaining operations to the Vector Math node https://developer.blender.org/D10650 
Geometry Nodes: Implicit conversion change for float/int/color to bool https://developer.blender.org/rB70061c69b79721a6b69475dd296b10a5c9658f1c 
Geometry Nodes: rename attribute domains https://developer.blender.org/D10803 
Geometry Nodes: Rename "Plane" primitive to "Grid" https://developer.blender.org/rB80530edcae5fe122f14a5e8acf22853daf5a3ecf 
UI: rename node editor sidebar categories https://developer.blender.org/D10804 

25:38 VSE
FFmpeg: improve threading settings https://developer.blender.org/rB1614795ae2bfc6369f28ff82811b432fceb57eb0 

28:17 OBJECTS
Object: faster object deletion https://developer.blender.org/rBda160dc32d1518dc3e59a8fb7995b59c88870444 
Knife: reduce redundant face picking queries https://developer.blender.org/rB6af4163a3f190ed8b33a622ac038d9df88757a20 
Knife: support vert/edge snapping when not directly over a face https://developer.blender.org/rB80cbbd2843c2358879b1a710d81a3b41e1468327 

30:29 CURVES
Curves: Add Taper Mode option https://developer.blender.org/D10779 

32:35 POTPOURRI
OSL: add basic OSL shader template https://developer.blender.org/D9933 

34:17 COMPOSITOR
Compositor: Display generated inputs in Viewers and Previews https://developer.blender.org/D10611 
Compositor: Add Anti-Aliasing node https://developer.blender.org/D2411 
Compositor automated testing https://developer.blender.org/D6334 

39:18 SHOUTOUT
Fix T83638: Fix mirror motion blur Jishan Singh (ringmaker) https://developer.blender.org/D10757 
Fix T86859: Allow covering of Taskbar when Fullscreen from Maximized https://developer.blender.org/D10811 
Fix T86924: UV Sync selection breaks individual origin calculation https://developer.blender.org/D10830 

41:41 Q&A

Support core Blender development - https://fund.blender.org

--

snippet.title: NEW BLENDER | Blender.Today LIVE #144
snippet.description:
BLENDER TODAY #144 - 22-03-2021

00:00 Intro
01:20 BLENDER ORG IS BACK! https://www.blender.org 
02:20 Blender Developers Live: Running backwards https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cqzoXV3KdPs 

04:30 GEOMETRY NODES
Geometry Nodes: Add initial version of mesh primitives https://developer.blender.org/D10715 
Geometry Nodes: Add geometry instances data to the spreadsheet https://developer.blender.org/D10770 
Geometry Nodes: Implicit interpolations to and from the edge domain https://developer.blender.org/D10765 
Geometry Nodes: Refactor / fix point separate node https://developer.blender.org/rB9b806c49d08a323f70a1ca23dc219d072b05cc61 

11:07 UI
Nodes: Add support to mute node wires  https://developer.blender.org/rB266cd7bb82ce4bfed20a3d61a84f25e2bacfca2b 
QOLD - UI: Dynamically increase data-block name button size if there's space https://developer.blender.org/rB2dd040a3495309566d6b2582e264b281752bcdd5 
Modify Dopesheet block between keyframes https://developer.blender.org/D10588 

18:14 GREASE PENCIL
Grease Pencil: Add LineArt modifier https://developer.blender.org/D8758 

24:52 VSE
FFmpeg: Improve proxy building performance https://developer.blender.org/D10731 
VSE: Automatic proxy building https://developer.blender.org/rB04e1feb83051f75317309ec3659b9263a99dbd7e 
VSE: Simplify proxy settings https://developer.blender.org/D10362 
https://developer.blender.org/T85469 
VSE: Preview images when moving strip handles https://developer.blender.org/D10424 
VSE: Add bold and italic option for text strip https://developer.blender.org/D10542 
VSE: Text strip improvements https://developer.blender.org/D10571 https://developer.blender.org/rB1c095203c275f84e6b024e09203ca228d19b8070 
Fix T85824: Transition between adjustment regression https://developer.blender.org/rBc81dfa2426084ab9e580047f568e4066cac34f2d 
VSE UI: Cleanup scene panel style https://developer.blender.org/D10663 

35:38 CYCLES
Fix T56925: Cycles banding artifacts in dense volumes https://developer.blender.org/D10576 
Cycles: optimize ensure_valid_reflection(), reduces render time by about 1% https://developer.blender.org/D10084  

37:34 COMPOSITOR
Compositor: Redesign Cryptomatte node for better usability https://developer.blender.org/D3959
https://developer.blender.org/D10705

41:56 POTPOURRI
Fix T86591: Tracking backwards is slower https://developer.blender.org/rBd955ce11706071cdc39bdaba27eb1cff177533f9 
Join curves: compensate for different bevel depths https://developer.blender.org/rBd5a705873e11510950b899caebd43ba47d69ccfa 
Python API: Expose CurveProfile Reset View function https://developer.blender.org/rBfc62d38ce105857f1c3400ba67271db7f2873a29 
Collection Manager: Add undo support. https://developer.blender.org/rBA88db9c67be6b851ca1a0edf9afab35531f5b1961 
Fix: Re-add legacy document icon on macOS https://developer.blender.org/D10746 

44:18 Q&A

Artwork by Simon Thommes and the Sprite Fright open movie team. Download the blend file at https://developer.blender.org/tag/geometry_nodes/ 

Support core Blender development - https://fund.blender.org

--

snippet.title: CYCLES ❤️ GEOMETRY NODES | Blender.Today LIVE #140
snippet.description:
It's a match!

BLENDER TODAY #140 - 22-02-2021
Sergey coding LIVE https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZUoTCONlcu4 
Render Module Update https://code.blender.org/2021/02/render-modules-update/
Creating Stylized Animals -- An Overview With Blender Studio Artist Julien Kaspar https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mCr0SQ7hhzs 

UI
Adding node groups via drag & drop (e.g. from Asset Browser) https://developer.blender.org/rB604e61d81d6326e665de6ec81dca2619e2cd5dbc
UI: FModifier layout updates, drag and drop https://developer.blender.org/D7997 
UI: fuzzy search in collection search https://developer.blender.org/D10446 

GEOMETRY NODES
Geometry Nodes: Add string input node https://developer.blender.org/rBa961a2189cb38ffb368d6781aa57177bfefe0e36
Geometry Nodes: Add simple subdivision surface node https://developer.blender.org/D10409 
Geometry Nodes: Node error messages https://developer.blender.org/D10290
Geometry Nodes: realize instances before passing geometry to constructive mesh modifier https://developer.blender.org/rB96da8e9ca302b8d879744318c5ad12c64a5b3c2c 
Geometry Nodes: convert point cloud to mesh vertices for modifiers https://developer.blender.org/rB999abee874bd7d69f6a40c27969598869799e8dc  
Geometry Nodes: support accessing vertex colors https://developer.blender.org/rBe3f0b6d5cbe5d34ac43568090c52a84dc51e579e 
Geometry Nodes: Expose material index attribute https://developer.blender.org/rB53bf04f2844b64cd9f79bedd047eac9690f872e3 
Cycles: support accessing custom mesh attributes https://developer.blender.org/D10210 
Geometry Nodes: Use corner domain for density map in Point Distribute node. https://developer.blender.org/D10461 

WORKBENCH
Workbench: Improve AntiAliasing sampling https://developer.blender.org/rB36814ddc94b56a66675b854bc0d7485828ddcd31 

OVERRIDES
LibOverride: Add support for rotation mode of PoseBones. https://developer.blender.org/rB82ade44299083e86acbaafbcb21ac350d861881d 

ASSETS
Assets: Remove appended asset when dropping operation fails https://developer.blender.org/rBe81fca1ed38ea447a1023dae3841f8980def28e4 

PYTHON
Python: Add to_curve method to the object API https://developer.blender.org/D10354 
macOS
macOS: add Embree, OpenImageDenoise and sse2neon libraries for ARM https://developer.blender.org/rBae370e292af2f7092db02301e9deb6dd9d7a1441 

ADD-ONS
After Effects export: add solid and image plane export https://developer.blender.org/rBACa140f066ac99e1860af38080f008507029a34706 

Thumbnail artwork by James Redmond https://www.blender.org/download/demo-files/#geometry-nodes

snippet.title: NEW EEVEE DOF IS UNREAL | Blender.Today LIVE #139
snippet.description:
BLENDER TODAY #139 - 15-02-2021

BLENDER 2.93 DROPS WINDOWS 7 SUPPORT

Python to 3.9.1 https://developer.blender.org/rB5bddfde217b1477c02de9dcfa8c078969d432519 

2.92
Cycles: Use Blender Settings For AOV https://developer.blender.org/rB26481eabe1e66da2a322190f15ad600d9d69bbee 
Fix T84114: Existence of vertex groups slows down mesh editing https://developer.blender.org/rB196dfc01a3e99c3bef0e44acf599bca50ae0300e 

EEVEE
EEVEE: Depth of field: New implementation https://developer.blender.org/rB000a340afa67a12a38c103e19f7d52ed42c4492e 

VSE
FFmpeg: Improve multi-threading settings https://developer.blender.org/rB5b2bfb2fed03274bd0bc2007c66118ca33c9f1ca 
FFmpeg: Improve multi-threading settings for VSE proxies https://developer.blender.org/D8659 

CYCLES
Cycles: Implement Dwivedi guiding for path-traced subsurface scattering https://developer.blender.org/D9932 

UI
Fix for T84038: Improved Report Warnings https://developer.blender.org/D10242 
Outliner: Enable render visibility column by default https://developer.blender.org/rB510db9512fc64d1739ee427f69d8674fbc7ca629 
WM: Add 'Confirm On Release' option for WM_OT_radial_control https://developer.blender.org/rB631cc5d56ee9445ece0a9982ed58b1de1dcbbe5b 
Transform: Expose the hardcoded Precision Key https://developer.blender.org/rBb926c9f34587651b6c39dc43608a79dd6367e9a8 

GEOMETRY NODES
Geometry Nodes: Add Combine and Separate XYZ nodes for attributes https://developer.blender.org/D10308
Geometry Nodes: Use multi-input socket in join geometry node https://developer.blender.org/rB9a9e19fdcc48622dba8f98c9afb10a6750ff22b0 
Geometry Nodes: Add operation setting to attribute randomize node https://developer.blender.org/rBd4fd06d6ce89113310bb769f4777c9a4d77cb155 
Geometry Nodes: Allow attribute nodes to use different domains https://developer.blender.org/rBd7c2c889a688067dab280fc137ad4c3c7ce4cb2b 
Geometry Nodes: initial attribute interpolation between domains https://developer.blender.org/D10305 
Geometry Nodes: Make instances real on-demand https://developer.blender.org/D10327 
Geometry Nodes: Refactor internal attribute access architecture. https://developer.blender.org/D10341 

GREASE PENCIL
GPencil: Fill tool refactor and Multiframe in Draw mode https://developer.blender.org/rB1352d81b174726639bbfb6f7aa32dbadf188a8dd 
GPencil: Basic block drawing in Dopesheet https://developer.blender.org/rBe44b2ada3e4ad1a5f89f5effd5bf493fd30fc6f2 

POTPOURRI
OpenColorIO: upgrade to version 2.0.0

--

Thumbnail artwork: Daniel Bystedt. Awesome EEVEE: Clément Foucault. Making all this possible: Development Fund members.
